tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Surgical Extractions of Teeth,Dental Fillings,
review: ****** **** *** *** **** *** *** ******* ** ****** ***********. I was initially scared of dental procedures but Dr. Mark made my treatment a pleasant experience... Now I blindly trust his diagnosis and treatment plan cause he is so accurate.. His personal care for each of his patients and follow ups are impeccable... I will definitely recommend Dr.Mark without second thoughts.. Also treatments were of good quality and affordable... Thank you Dr.Mark & his team...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mark is really good. He explains everything very clearly and makes the procedure extremely easy. I would surely recommend him to anyone. My mother always goes to Dr Mark. She is 75 and loves the dentist experience because of Dr Mark.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great doc and support staff. Highly recommenced. Went for a follow up and consult for future dental plans and procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Wisdom Teeth,Dental Crowns,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Dr. Mark was the second lead doctor on my cosmetic treatment, the team gave me such an amazing smile that I had the confidence and look I needed to win the Femina Miss India title 2012 (just a month after treatment). Since then Dr. Mark has been treating me for the past 8 years. He is extremely patient and kind, answering all queries and explaining all procedures in detail before starting any procedure. He is committed to 'no pain' treatments and even though I used to hate going to the dentist growing up, now a visit to Mark's clinic is a peaceful experience with no expectation of pain or trauma. Dr. Mark also has a great eye for cosmetic adjustments that need to be made, he knows exactly how to enhance your smile while still keeping a natural look. He uses only the latest technology and best products and his pricing is very fair. Overall would recommend Dr. Mark 100%

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Mark is amazing ..not just as a doctor but as a person. Very gentle and caring. Very knowledgeable too. 
I had a simple problem.. but somehow got complicated because of my earlier sinusitis. He took the trouble of calling my son and going with us to my ENT doc to check on what my problem could be. 
He is truly wonderful. Thank you Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dentist appointments are something a person looks forward to . At least that has been my experience so far . With Mark’s cheerful attitude and chatting away things gets done in no time . That’s exactly how I felt . The 20 minutes flew and he was done and I was comfortable and relaxed .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Thomas was fantastic - he explained the issues, laid out treatment options, planned a treatment route, and answered every single question I came up with. He managed to finally fix long-standing issues many dentists in the past hadn't been able to, and I would recommend him to anyone who is looking for a responsive and very talented doctor for dental work.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: On a scale of 1-10 Dr. Mark Thomas is an 18! Would recommend Dr. Thomas for any Dental work!  Excellent in his words of advice as well as his commitment to a painfree Dental work. He always commits to the best possible price as well to help all who come to Tune 32.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the flattering feedback. You’re too kind. :) See you soon.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The clinic is very central and very clean. The Doctor was very through and gave us the best possible solution for the problem. He also explained it very well and his approach towards a 10 year old was wonderful, making my son want to go back happily for more treatment. Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback and kind words. Hope to see Ari soon. :)
